name: Lochridge
address: Ravine Parkway + Jamaica Avenue South, Cottage Grove, Minnesota 55016
description:
ABOUT THE HOME ENERGY RATING SCALE
The HERS (Home Energy Rating System) Index allows buyers to compare the relative energy efficiency of different homes. The HERS Index home energy rating is determined by an independent RESNET-certified home energy rater ("Rater"). The lower a home’s score, the more energy efficient it is in comparison to the HERS referenced home. For every one-point decrease in the HERS Index score, there is a corresponding one percent (1%) reduction in energy consumption as compared to a home with a HERS Index of 100. A home with a HERS score of 100 reflects a home built to 2006 IEEC Building Codes. See the bottom of this page for more information on HERS scores.

amenities.name: New single-family
amenities.description: New single-family homes starting in the $400's

amenities.name: Enjoy top-rated
amenities.description: Enjoy top-rated education with Lochridge's location in the sought-after East Ridge High School boundary within the highly regarded South Washington County School District.

amenities.name: Benefit convenient
amenities.description: Benefit from convenient access to major transportation routes like I-494, Highway 61/10, and key metro employment hubs.

amenities.name: Explore scenic
amenities.description: Explore scenic walking trails, a tranquil wetland, and Lake Robert, all integrated into the neighborhood’s design.

amenities.name: Look forward
amenities.description: Look forward to a planned public park in the southeast corner, connecting to the city’s trail system and Glacial Valley Park for recreation.

amenities.name: Live near
amenities.description: Live near everyday essentials with proximity to retail stores, grocery options, pharmacies, and fitness centers in Cottage Grove and Woodbury.

amenities.name: Dine variety
amenities.description: Dine at a variety of fast-casual and sit-down restaurants, including Chipotle, Noodles & Co., and local breweries.
